rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C123653

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire EXACT Test Code Terminology

definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome test code.
name: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire EXACT Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome Test Code

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did your chest feel congested today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How often did you cough today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How much mucus (phlegm) did you bring up when coughing today?
terms.preferredTerm: EXACT - Bring Up Mucus When Coughing

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How difficult was it to bring up mucus (phlegm) today?
terms.preferredTerm: EXACT - Difficult to Bring Up Mucus

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did you have chest discomfort today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did your chest feel tight today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you breathless today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Describe how breathless you were today.
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual personal care activities like washing or dressing?
terms.preferredTerm: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Personal Care

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual indoor activities like cleaning or household work?
terms.preferredTerm: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Indoor Activities

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual activities outside the home such as yard work or errands?
terms.preferredTerm: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Activities Outside

terms.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you tired or weak today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Last night, was your sleep disturbed?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How scared or worried were you about your lung problems today?
